post.author: 구게시판
post.content:
김우성 wrote:

당근입니다.. 단순히 fdisk 해서는 지울수 없죠.... 마스터 부트 파트션에 그 정보가
기록 되서요......

fdisk /mbr 물론 dos 화면에서 합니다.. 그럼 아무런 동작을 하지 안는것 처럼 보이지만
실제로는 해결 되죠.... 그럼 수고 하세요... 안녕......


James lee wrote:

>Hello.
>I want to delete Linux partitions from my hard drive.
>Of course I tried dos fdisk and linux fdisk for it.
>Unfortunately I can`t.
>If you know how to do that, Please let me know it.
>On linux I command ` fdisk -d`, but it is not available command.
>I heard from many linux partitions could be deleted by linux fdisk.
>If you know this as well, please answer me.
>Thank you for reading.
>
post.title: [re] [2000/4/16] Linux partitions??? (김우성)
